attributes.action: Reduce the effects of Type 2 Diabetes using the 8-week blood sugar diet method.
attributes.additional_details:
Reference 1: "The  8-week blood sugar diet method" by Dr Michael Mosley and Prof. Roy taylor
Reference 2: Colin Beattie MSP (successful use of this method)
Reference 3: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-3404259/Eat-beat-diabetes-just-eight-weeks-s-life-changing-diet-help-avoid-reverse-Type-2-diabetes-best-s-tasty-way-health.html
attributes.background: Increasing numbers of people are recovering from type 2 diabetes without drugs using the nutrician based 8-week blood sugar diet method at a time when instances of limb amputations, blindness and other complications are rising dramatically.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling on the NHS to encourage this kind of treatment for Type 2 diabetes.
